title: Pillivuyt Sancerre Ramekin 5 Ounce
features: Impenetrable glaze that will not craze, is hygienic and easy to clean, dishwasher-safe and resistant to scratching and chipping
Excellent heat retention to keep food warm at the table
Simple white design complements any kitchen or tabletop décor and is attractive enough to go with fine china on your table

description: Let your imagination be the inspiration! Ramekins, mise en place, pinch bowls, tidbit dishes - there are almost as many names for these little dishes as there are functions. Have all your ingredients ready to add to your creations, create charming small dishes and desserts. Use them for dipping, sauces or small savories. The Sancerre Ramekin is simple, but unique with it's flared edge. As with all Pillivuyt porcelain, the Deep Pleated Ramkin is microwave and oven-safe, even for broiling. It can go directly from freezer to oven. The simple, white design complements any kitchen or tabletop decor and is attractive enough to go with fine china to your table. Pillivuyt porcelain offers excellent heat retention to keep food warm at the table and it's impenetrable glaze will not craze or stain and is hygienic and easy to clean. All Pillivuyt porcelain products are dishwasher-safe and resistant to scratching and chipping. All Pillivuyt products are also lead and cadmium-free and guaranteed 100% food-safe. Pillivuyt porcelain is hand-crafted by artisans in a French factory that was family-founded in 1818.
